206553.「俺は 魔獣をあやつり 世界に恐怖と混乱を\n もたらした……。弁解の余地もない:
As you know, I was the master of those
terrible beasts. The bringer of terror and
chaos to the world...

206554.「魔獣との戦いに 身を投じてきた お前には\n 話しておかねばなるまいな。:
Since you've been fighting against me for so
long, the least I can do is give you a full
explanation.

206555.「無限獣ネロスゴーグ 喪心獣ゾンテドール\n 憑依獣ザルボーグ 増殖獣バイロゴー:
Nerosugog... Zontedor... Zalborg...
Biologog...
I will tell you just what they are.

206556.「かつて 俺は 神墟ナドラグラムで\n 竜神の心臓を奪取した。:
Once, I seized the Dragon God's Heart in the
Nadragram Shrine.

206557.「王立アルケミアに隠されていた 特殊な\n 魔獣の卵を孵化させるため 竜神の心臓:
The reason for this was that the enormous energy contained within the Heart was needed to hatch the eggs of special magical beasts
hidden within the Royal Alchemia.

206558.「そうして生まれた 魔獣たちに 俺は\n アストルティアの歴史に その名を刻む\:
To the beasts born from this, I gave the
abilities of fearsome monsters whose names
were etched into Astoltia's history.

206559.「魔獣の能力を成長させ その絶頂期を見計らい\n 魔獣ごと 終焉の繭に吸収させる:
The Timeseer Box... Kyuronos' plan was to nurture the ability of those beasts, and at the peak of their power, have their entire
being absorbed into the cocoon.

206560.「その計画も お前の活躍により 完璧なものには\n ならなかったが……魔獣の肉体:
And while that plan may not have been perfected thanks to your efforts... the lifeform within the cocoon is steadily being
perfected by absorbing the beasts' bodies.

206561.「そして キュロノスは 繭から羽化した\n 生命体に おのが精神を移すことで\n:
Kyuronos is attempting to give itself a
perfect body by transferring its own soul into
the lifeform that will hatch from the cocoon.

206562.「人の世を……世界を終わらせる そのために。: To end mankind...and the entire world.

206563.「……キュロノスの支配下にあった 俺は\n それを 未来を守るためと 信じ込まさ:
Kyuronos tricked me into believing it was to
protect the future, and I was forced to do its
bidding.

206564.「実際は そのすべてが\n 世界に仇なす行為だった……。:
In truth, it was nothing more than an act of
vengeance against the world...

206565.「……時獄の迷宮に行き キュロノスを倒す。\n それが 罪を重ねてきた 俺にでき:
I will go to the Time Labyrinth and defeat
Kyuronos. That's the least I can do to atone
for the many sins I've committed...

206566.「また ひとりで 行くつもりなのね。\n ムチャよ！ 回復したばかりなんでしょ？:
You're going by yourself again. You can't do
this! You just got better, didn't you?

206567.「メレアーデ……お前が無事で 安心した。\n しかし この時代に 来ていたとは…:
Mereade... I am so relieved that you are safe.
But I had no idea you were here in this
time...

206568.「俺のせいだな……本当に すまない。: It's all my fault... I'm so sorry.

206569.「私は……大丈夫よ。いろいろ あったけど……\n <pc>に 助けてもらえたから:
I'm...I'm okay. I've been through a lot, but
<pc> helped me through it.

206570.「それよりも 叔父様。\n 行くなら 私も連れていって。\n 何か 手伝えること:
But more importantly... If you're going, take
me with you. There might be something I can
help you with.

206571.「<pc>だって そう思うでしょ？\n ふたりで 叔父様を助けましょうよ。:
You feel the same, right, <pc>?
We can both help him, can't we?

206573.「時空の狭間にある 時獄の迷宮には 一度でも\n そこへ到達した者しか 行くこと:
The Time Labyrinth, located within the rift
in spacetime, can only be reached by those
who have been there once before.

206574.「いかに 時渡りのチカラが 強かろうと\n 時獄の迷宮に入るのは 不可能だ。:
No matter how powerful you may be, it is
impossible to enter the Time Labyrinth
otherwise.

206575.「そんな……どうにか ならないの？\n ３人で行ったほうが きっと うまくいくわ:
Is there really no other way? I'm sure it will
work out if the three of us go together.

206576.「今は 一刻を争うときだ。: It's a race against the clock.

206577.「ただ……マデ神殿になら 時獄へと至る\n 特別な方法が あるかもしれない……。:
But...there may be a special way to enter the
Time Labyrinth inside the Made Temple...
though it's just a legend.

206578.「すっかり 世話をかけたな <pc>。\n 無事に やりとげたら あらためて礼に:
Thanks for all your help, <pc>.
I'll be sure to thank you properly when I'm
done. Until then, take care of Mereade.

206579.「メレアーデも……気持ちだけで 充分だ。\n 絶対 マローネを救いだしてみせる。:
And Mereade... your feelings are enough. I
will save Marone, I promise. So...don't worry
too much.

206580.「心配するなって 言われても\n そんなの……ムリだわ。:
Even if you say not to worry... that's
impossible for me.

206581.「パドレ叔父様のいう マデ神殿というのは\n 王都キィンベルの北西にある 禁足地:
The Made Temple that Padre mentioned is a
forbidden site northwest of Kimbel. It could
be our way into the Time Labyrinth...

206582.「考えても はじまらないわね。\n まずは 王都へ行って マデ神殿に入るには\n:
There's no time to stop and think about it.
First, let's go to the city and try to
figure out how to get into the temple.

206583.「どうやら 方針は 決まったキュね。\n 王都キィンベルを目指して\n エテーネ:
It looks like we've decided on a course of
action, kyu. Ethenel Cube, setting course for
the royal city of Kimbel, kyu!

206584.「……黒曜の隕石孔には 誰も近づかせるな。\n 異変があったら すぐに 知らせろ:
...No one is allowed near the Meteorite Hole.
If you see anything out of the ordinary, let
me know immediately, no matter how small.

206587.「背なんか すっかり 高くなって……\n 弟っていうよりも むしろ お兄さんね。:
You've gotten so tall... you're more like a
big brother than a little brother.

206588.「姉さんは 変わらないな。\n 記憶の中の 姉さんのままで うれしいよ。:
You haven't changed. I'm glad you're still the
same sister I remember.

206589.「エテーネに帰ってから すぐ\n 姉さんの捜索を 始めたんだが\n 手がかりすら:
I started searching for you as soon as I got
back to Ethene, but when there was no sign of
you, I was at a loss.

206590.「そう…………。心配 かけたみたいね。\n あなたは １０年以上も\n ウルベア:
I see... it looks like I made you worry. I
heard you had been living in the Urbea
Underground City for over a decade...

206591.「そして……処刑された とも……。\n いったい どういうことなの？:
And that you... were executed... What
happened?

206592.「ああ……こいつのおかげでね。: Yeah... it was thanks to this.

206593.「<kyodai>と 俺のために作った\n ふたつの エテーネルキューブ……\n:
<kyodai> and the two Ethenel Cubes
they made for me... this is one of them.

206594.「あの時 深手を負い 地面に激突する寸前に\n こいつが発動して 俺は この時代:
Just before I hit the ground with my grievous
wound, it activated and brought me back to
this time period. It was truly a miracle...

206595.「その エテーネルキューブを作るため\n グルヤンラシュと名乗って ガテリアの人:
Is it true that you called yourself Guryan
Rush and did terrible things to the people of
Gateria in order to make that Ethenel Cube?

206596.「この時代に……エテーネ王国に戻るには\n ああするほか 道はなかった。:
In that time... there was no other way to
return to the Ethene Kingdom.

206597.「弁解しないのね……。\n ひとつの国家を 地上から消し去って……\n いったい:
You have nothing to say for yourself...? For
the many lives lost from wiping an entire
nation off the face of the earth?

206598.「クオード……ねえ わかってるの？\n あなたがやったことの 意味を。:
Quard... do you know? Do you even understand
what it is you did?

206599.「民の幸せを守る 王になるって\n 私に誓ったわよね？ 異国の民になら\n 何を:
Didn't you vow that you would be a king who would protect the people's happiness? You can't just do as you please to the people of
another country!

206600.「……俺を責めて 気がすむのなら いくらでも\n 責めればいい。だが どんな犠牲:
Blame me all you want if it makes you feel
better. But no matter what the cost, I
couldn't let myself die in that time.

206601.「エテーネ王国を 滅亡から救うまで\n 俺は 死ねない！\n この命は……エテー:
I will not die until I have saved the Ethene
Kingdom from destruction! I will use my life
for the good of Ethene.

206602.「……そうか。まだ 知らないんだな。\n 我が国に迫る 滅びの危機を……。:
...I see. You still don't know. The imminent
doom of our nation...

206603.「俺は 未来のウルベア帝国で\n この時代 エテーネ王国が 跡形もなく\n 水没:
I learned that in the future Urbea Empire,
this period of history, the Ethene Kingdom was
submerged and destroyed without a trace.

206604.「原因は 地脈エネルギーの 急激な枯渇に\n よるものらしい。そして 今まさに\:
The cause is apparently the rapid depletion of
geo-energy. And now it has been confirmed that
this is exactly what is happening.

206605.「だが エテーネ王家に つらなる者として\n 俺は この国を アストルティアの歴:
But as a member of the royal house of Ethene,
I will not let this country be erased from the
history of Astoltia!

206606.「国を救うために 帰ってきたんじゃ\n ないとすると……\n 何か ほかに事情が:
If you didn't come back to save your
country... is there something else going on?

206607.<pc>は クオードに\n封印されている マデ神殿に\n入るための手段を探してい:
<pc> informed Quard that they were
looking for a way to enter the sealed Made
Temple.

206608.「マデ神殿……あそこは 王家の祖先によって\n 封印された 禁足地だったはず……:
Made Temple... it's a forbidden place sealed off by our royal ancestors... if you want to know more about it, you'll have to search
through the ancient documents.

206609.「……いいだろう。何か理由があるようだし\n 神殿に入る方法は 俺が探そう。\n:
...Very well. Whatever your reasons, I will find a way to get you into the temple. But in exchange, I want your help in preventing the
submersion.

206610.「……姉さん。\n 俺のことを 信用してくれないか？\n たしかに この手は 血:
Mereade... You trust me, don't you? You're
right, there's blood on my hands.

206611.「だが エテーネの救済に つながるなら\n 約束を たがえたりはしない……。\n:
But I will not renege on my promise if it
leads to the salvation of Ethene, I swear it
on my life!

206612.「どうして ウルベアや ガテリアの人たちにも\n 今と同じだけの 思いやりを\n:
Why couldn't you show the same amount of
compassion to the people of Urbea and Gateria
as you do now...?

206613.「メレアーデには 抵抗感があるみたいキュね。\n けど クオードと手を組むのが:
Mereade seems to have some reservations, kyu.
But the most efficient way is to join forces
with Quard. There's no time for detours, kyu.

206614.「魔法生物を 連れているのか？ <pc>。\n お前に そんなシュミがあったとは:
You have a magical creature with you,
<pc>? I didn't know you had an
interest in them.

206615.「やれやれキュ～。このボクと 魔法生物の\n ちがいすら 見分けられないなんて！:
Good grief, kyu! I can't believe he can't even tell the difference between me and a magical creature! I really do believe that
this man is blind, kyu.

206616.「……いいわ。申し出を 受けましょう。\n 滅亡のふちに立たされた エテーネを救:
...Okay. I accept your offer. It is not only
your duty to save Ethene from destruction, but
mine as well.

206617.「ただし やるからには 絶対に成功させるわよ！\n この国に生きる すべての人た:
But if we're going to do this, it absolutely
must work! And...when we've made sure
that everyone's future is protected, then...

206620.「さっそくだが 計画の話に移ろう。\n まず 王都の自宅にいる ディアンジを訪ね:
Let's discuss the plan right away. First, I
would like you to visit Dianji at his home in
the Royal City and hear what he has to say.

206621.「計画には ある錬成物が 必要なんだが……\n どうも 苦戦しているようでな。\:
I'm in need of a certain alchemical, but I've
been having trouble getting my hands on it.
That's where you come in.

206622.「俺のほうは 計画全体を指揮しつつ\n マデ神殿への入り方を 調べておく。:
I will be overseeing the plan as a whole, and
finding out how to get you into Made Temple in
the meantime.

206623.「それと エテーネの滅亡については\n 無用な混乱をさけるためにも いっさい\n:
And as for the destruction of Ethene, please
keep it to yourself to avoid any unnecessary
panic. I'm counting on you.

206624.「ややっ！？\n <pc>さんじゃないですか！\n いらっしゃい おひさしぶりで:
What's this?! If it isn't <pc>!
Welcome! It's been some time, hasn't it!

206626.「まぼろしではないから 安心して。\n 私たちは クオードに頼まれて 来たのよ。:
Don't worry, I'm no mirage. We're here at
Quard's request.

206627.「クオード様に お会いになったんですか！\n さぞや およろこびだったでしょう！:
So you met with Master Quard! He must have
been so happy to see you!!

206628.「ディ…ディアンジ。いいい いつまで\n メレアーデ様を 立たせておくつもりだ。:
Di...Dianji. H-h-how long are you going to
keep Lady Mereade standing? H-h-hurry up and
give her a seat.

206629.「おーっと そうでした！？\n ささっ。どうぞ おかけになってください。\n 今:
Oops, that's right! Come, come, have a seat.
I'll bring you some tea.

206632.「ふたりとも ありがとう。\n 以前と変わらず クオードに\n 尽くしてくれてる:
Thank you both. It seems you're still quite
dedicated to Quard.

206633.「はい！ 見た目は すっかり変わられましたが\n クオード様は 以前のままですよ:
Yes! He may look completely different, but Master Quard is still the same as before. He is a kind and gentle soul with an honest
heart.

206634.「ままま…前にも増して くくく国を愛し\n 民を思いやるように な…なられた！\:
H-h-he has become even more loving to his c-c-country and considerate of the p-people! It's a sign that he is becoming more aware of
his position as king.

206635.「……でででも どこか 遠くに感じる。\n 心に何かを ひ…秘めてるような……。:
...B-b-but he feels distant. Like he's
h-hiding something in his heart...

206636.「そりゃあ オトナなんですからねぇ。\n 私たちにだって 話せないことの\n ひ:
Of course, we are adults, you know. Even we
have one or two things we can't talk about,
don't we?

206638.「ディアンジ……\n 私たち あなたを手伝うために 来たのよ。: Dianji...we are here to help you.

206639.「地脈エネルギーの枯渇で エテーネが水没する。\n この危機を どうにかするため:
Ethene is sinking due to the depletion of geo-energy. I'm told plans are afoot to do something about this crisis... but there's
some kind of trouble?

206640.「……じつは そうなんです。\n 私のウデが 未熟なばかりに 計画に必要な\n:
...It's just as you heard. My inexperience
with alchemy is making the creation of a Geode
Crystal for the plan very time-consuming.

206641.「できれば 自力で 完成させたかったのですが\n この上は どなたか 優秀な錬金:
I had hoped to complete it myself, but now I'm
thinking of asking a more talented alchemist
to do it for me...

206642.「できそうな人に 心当たりはあるの？: Can you think of anyone capable of doing it?

206643.「う～ん かなり 高度な錬金術ですから\n 相当な実力のある 錬金術師でないと…:
Well, it is very advanced alchemy, so it must
be a very skilled alchemist... I can't think
of anyone off the top of my head.

206644.「そういうことなら 私と <pc>で\n 地脈の結晶を 錬金できそうな人を探すわ:
In that case, <pc> and I will find
someone who can alchemize the Geode Crystal.
<if_woman>She<else>He<endif> is reliable, so don't worry!

206645.「おお 手伝ってくださいますか！\n ご協力 感謝 感謝ですよぉ。\n これで:
Oh, you're really going to help? Thank you so
much! Now I can concentrate on preparing the
other things we'll need!

206646.「では <pc>さんには\n こちらを お渡ししておきますね。: Then I will give you this, <pc>.

206647.<pc>は ディアンジから\n地脈の結晶のレシピ（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った:
<pc> received
the Geode Crystal Recipe (Key Item) from
Dianji!<me 60>

206648.「そのレシピを 錬金術師に見せて\n 作れるかどうか 聞いてみてください。:
Show that recipe to the alchemist and ask them
if they can make it.

206649.「やみくもに探し回るより まずは\n この国の 錬金術師の知り合いを 訪ねて\n:
Instead of blindly searching around, you should first visit your alchemist acquaintances in this country and ask them to
introduce you to some excellent ones.

206650.「……ワグミカさん。考えなおしてください。\n あなたの錬金術のウデに 大勢の命:
...Ms. Wagmika. Please reconsider. Many lives
and the future of the kingdom depend on your
alchemical skills.

206651.「フン。どこかで見た カオだと思えば\n ドミネウスの 娘っ子か！:
Hmm. I've seen this face somewhere, and it's
Domineus' daughter!

206652.「国を ほったらかしにして 行方を\n くらませていた 王族の小娘ふぜいが\n:
Where do you get off talking to me like that
when you were the one who abandoned your
country and vanished, huh? Hic!

206653.「同志 ワグミカ。本日の 農作業のノルマを\n 達成いたしました……おっと\n:
Comrade Wagmika. I have fulfilled my quota for
today's farm work... oh, I didn't know you had
company. Pardon the interruption!

206654.「ふるえを治す お薬があるんですよね？\n どうか お薬を飲んで 地脈の結晶の錬:
You have medicine that cures tremors, don't
you? Please, take the medicine and try to
alchemise the Geode Crystal.

206655.「ぬしの親父のせいで ワシのキャリアは台無し！\n なのに 必要になったから 手:
Your father ruined my career! And now you want
me to help you just because you asked? You've
got some nerve!

206656.「ぬしを見てると ドミネウスのクソを\n 思いだして 気分が悪くなるわ！\n 薬:
You remind me of that Domineus bastard and it
makes me sick! Who the hell would take that
medicine, anyway? Now, go away!

206657.「も…もうしわけないんだモーン。\n ご主人も 飲みたくないと 言ってるので\n:
Sorry. Master doesn't want to drink her
medicine, so you'll have to leave for now.

206658.「ワグミカさんには お薬が必要よ。\n モモンタルちゃんだって ずっと このまま:
Wagmika needs her medicine. Sanguintal, you
don't think she can stay like this forever, do
you?

206659.「ワグミカ殿！\n 聞こえてますか？ ワグミカ殿！: Miss Wagmika! Can you hear me? Miss Wagmika!

206660.「なんてことだ……王立アルケミアに通じる\n 秘密の通路の ありかを 聞きにきた:
Geez... I came here to ask about the location
of the secret passage to Royal Alchemia, and
here you are at rock bottom...

206662.「しょうのない ご主人なんだモン。\n 今 お持ちするんだモーン。: You're so hopeless, Master. I'll go get some.

206663.「あいや。待たれよ モモンタル殿。\n クチでは ああ言ってますが ワグミカ殿が:
No, wait, Sanguintal. She may be saying that,
but that's not what Miss Wagmika really needs.

206664.「これを お使いください。\n 身体じゅうの毒素を抜く 丸薬です。:
Use this. It's medicine that removes toxins
from the body.

206665.「ちと……いや 超がつくほど 苦いのですが\n 健全な身体になれば ワグミカ殿も:
It's a little...well, extremely bitter, but I
think a healthy body will help Miss Wagmika
get out of her self-indulgent lifestyle.

206666.「ファ ファラス君……。\n かたじけないッ……かたじけないモン！: Mr. Faras... Thank you... thank you!

206667.「真に 主が求めるものを見抜き\n 主のために 行動できる者こそが 真の従者。\:
A true follower is one who can tell what their
lord truly needs, and acts upon it. I hope we
can both live up to that expectation.

206668.「フンッ！ 民草のためならば 協力もしよう。\n じゃが 相手が王族なら 話は別:
Hmph! I'm willing to help if it's for the good
of the people, but royalty's a different
story! I won't lift a finger!

206669.「あっかん べろべろべぇ～！\n ドミネウスの娘よッ！ ぬしも 人生がクソだと\:
Nyeh nyeh! Daughter of Domineus! It's time you
learned that life isn't fair! Eeheeheeheehee!

206670.「ゴシュジーン！！ 見苦しいモーンッ！\n 今すぐ ファラス君のくれた あの薬を:
MASTER!! You're a disgrace! Now come to
your senses and take the medicine that Mr.
Faras gave you!!

206671.「だまらっしゃ～い！\n ワシに作られた 魔法生物がッ！\n 主人である ワシに:
Shut up! I'm the one who created you magical
creatures! You dare order your master around!?

206672.「クソぅ……何もかも ドミネウスのせいじゃ。\n ワシから 仕事を！ 地位を！:
Damn... it's all Domineus' fault. My job! My
prestige! My reason for living! He took it all
away from me! It's all his fault!!

206673.「いいかげんに するんだモンッ！\n ドミネウスが クソだからって ご主人が\n:
Enough! Just because Domineus was a
bastard doesn't mean you have to waste away
the rest of your life!

206674.「ご主人を頼ってきた <pc>君や\n メレアーデ君に チカラを貸してあげるモン:
<pc> and Ms. Mereade came here to
ask for Master's help, mon! Don't let them
leave here thinking that life is cruel.

206675.「そんな ムダなことをして ワシに\n なんの得があると いうんじゃい！:
What's in it for me by wasting my time like
that!?

206676.「損得の話じゃないモン！ 人生はクソだと\n うつむいて 腐ってしまった人の救い:
It's not about profit! I want my Master
back, the kind of Master who brings salvation
to the suffering and downtrodden.

206677.「ボクは また 従者として\n ご主人を ほこりに思いたいんだモン！: I want to be proud to be your servant again!

206679.「……フンッ！\n たまには お前のカオを立ててやるか……。\n 飲んでやるのじ:
...Hmph! When I see your face like that...
Fine! I'll do it! I'll take this ungodly
bitter medicine!

206680.ワグミカは 超苦い薬を クチに放り込み\n甘々シロップで 飲み下した。:
Wagmika popped the super bitter medicine into
her mouth and washed it down with the Sweet
Syrup.

206681.間もなくして ワグミカの身体から\n大量の汗とともに 毒素が排出された。:
Soon, Wagmika's body expelled the toxins in a
deluge of sweat.

206682.そして 手のふるえが おさまると\nワグミカは 錬金釜の前に立ち\n難なく 地脈:
And when the trembling in her hands subsided,
Wagmika stood before her Alchemy Pot and
effortlessly completed the Geode Crystal!

206683.「見苦しいところを お見せしました。\n こちらが ご所望の地脈の結晶です。:
I'm sorry to have shown you something so
unsightly. Here is the Geode Crystal you
requested.

206685.「何に使うか 知りませんが その道具は\n 地脈エネルギーを吸い上げる 危険な代:
I don't know what you need it for, but it is a
dangerous tool that sucks up the energy of the
earth's veins. Please do not misuse it.

206686.「ワグミカさんが 協力してくれて よかったわ。\n さっそく ディアンジのもとへ:
I'm glad Ms. Wagmika decided to help us. Let's
go deliver the Geode Crystals to Dianji right
away.

206687.「あっ <cs_pchero>さん！\n 待ってましたよぅ！:
Ah, <cs_pchero>! I've been waiting for
you!

206688.「あの亀裂の はるか下に 水没の元凶が\n エサ場にしている 地脈エネルギーの\:
There is a Vein Point of geo-energy far below
that crevice where the culprit of the
submergence is currently feeding.

206689.「島にある ３か所のエサ場を失った 元凶は\n 残された湧点……つまり この真下:
With the other Vein Points drained, this is
the only one left... meaning, our culprit will
definitely make their way here.

206690.「へへへ。まあ 全部 クオード様の\n 受け売りなんですけどね。: Hehehe. Well, it was all Master Quard's idea.

206691.「そうそう。<cs_pchero>さん\n 地脈の結晶を こちらに。:
Oh, right. <cs_pchero>, hand me the Geode
Crystal.

206692.<cs_pchero>は 地脈の結晶を\nディアンジに渡した。:
<cs_pchero> gave the Geode Crystal to
Dianji.

206693.「今から その元凶を おびき寄せます。\n な～に どんな化け物が 飛び出してこ:
Now we'll lure out the fiend. No matter what
kind of monster might pop out, we are more
than prepared. Just sit back and watch!

206694.「今ここにあるのは 地底のエサ場の\n ３倍に相当する量の 地脈エネルギーなんで:
There's now three times the amount of
geo-energy here. There's no way it'll be able
to resist a meal like this...

206695.「さあ 食いしん坊さん！\n こっちに もっと も～っと\n おいしいエサが あ:
Come on, you glutton! Come and get your just
desserts!

206697.「でも 大丈夫ですよぉ。\n ちゃ～んと 奥の手を 用意してますからねっ！:
But don't worry. I've got a secret weapon up
my sleeve!

206698.「ふぃ～。これにて 一件落着ですよぅ。\n おふたりとも お疲れさまでした。:
Phew! That takes care of that. Thank you both
for your hard work.

206699.「それにしても これに封じた魔物……\n どこかで 見覚えがあるんですよねぇ。\:
By the way, the monster sealed in this jar...
looked kind of familiar. It looked like a
Wyrtle with three horns...

206700.「そうですよぅ！ ヨンゲ所長の飼っていた\n 魔法生物の メガロダイン…………ん:
That's right! It's that magical creature that
Director Yong hadーthe Megalodyne!
...Hmm?

206701.「ひっ ひぇええええええっ！\n どどど どおしましょうぉおおお！！\n そそ:
E, eeeeekk!! W-w-what do we do!? This wasn't
supposed to happen!

206702.「こうなったら いったん 引き返して\n 援軍を呼んでくるしか……。:
We're going to have to retreat and call for
reinforcements...

206703.「そんなことしてたら 逃げられてしまうわ。\n ここで 倒すしかないわよ！:
If we do that, it'll get away. We have to take
it down here!

206705.「あんな 凶暴なやつを しとめるなんて\n さすがは <cs_pchero>さん:
I had no doubt that you'd be able to take
down such a ferocious foe!

206706.「はぁはぁ……でも メレアーデ様まで\n 戦うなんて……もし クオード様が知れば:
(pant) ...But if Master Quard found out that
you were fighting, too... He'd scold you
senseless out of sheer worry, you know...

206707.「それは どうかしらね……。\n あの子も私も もう 子供じゃないから。: I doubt that... We aren't children anymore.

206708.「地脈エネルギーが 枯れた状態が続いてて\n 大エテーネ島の地盤が 不安定になっ:
The geo-energy in the veins has dried up,
making the earth of Greater Ethene unstable.
The earthquake is surely because of that.

206709.「こうしては いられません！\n 地脈の結晶に集めた エネルギーを\n 至急 大:
This isn't good! We have to return the energy
collected in the Geode Crystal to the earth
right away!

206710.「今 未来が変わったキュ！\n どうやら この島が水没する未来を\n 回避できた:
The future changed just now, kyu! Looks like
we've averted a future where this island will
be flooded, kyu!

206711.「ディアンジー！ 王都へ戻りましょう！\n クオードが 吉報を待ってるわー。:
Dianji! Let's go back to the city!
Quard will be waiting for the good news!

206713.「そのカオ……どうやら 水没の元凶を\n 倒してくれたようだな。\n ザグルフの:
From the look on your face... I'd say you took
care of the source of the submersion. Zagulf's
intuition was right again.

206715.「いいい以前は 感じられた 元凶の気配が\n き…消えたので 黒曜の隕石孔まで行:
I-I-I went to the Meteorite Hole to
investigate the s-s-source of the problem.

206716.「……というわけだ。お前たちの\n 晴れやかなカオと合わせて 考えれば\n 計画:
...There you have it. Along with those bright
expressions on your faces, I'm convinced that
the plan was a complete success.

206717.「ご報告の手間が はぶけたようですね。:
Well, that saves me the trouble of making my
report.

206718.「地震も ピタリとやんだし\n 結晶に集めた 地脈エネルギーは\n ちゃんと 大:
The earthquakes have stopped, and the
geo-energy collected in the Crystal was
returned, right?

206720.「礼を言う お前たち。\n エテーネの滅びは 無事 回避できた！:
Thank you, all. The destruction of Ethene has
been averted!

206721.「地の底にうごめく 元凶の存在に気付き\n 居場所を特定したのは ザグルフだった:
It was Zagulf who noticed that the source of the problem was lurking underground and pinpointed its location. Your observations
have saved us countless times.

206722.「ももも…もったいない お言葉……。: I-I-I... I'm not worthy... I'm so happy...

206723.「そして ディアンジ。計画に必要な\n 数々の錬成物を よくぞ そろえてくれた。:
And Dianji. You have done a great job of preparing the many alchemicals necessary for our plan. I thank you from the bottom of my
heart.

206724.「私なぞ たいしたことは してませんよぅ。\n そもそも 自力では 地脈の結晶を:
I didn't do much. I couldn't even alchemise
the Geode Crystal by myself, and I had to rely
on <pc>...

206725.「自分の至らないところを 素直に認め\n 人を頼ってでも 成果をあげようとした。:
You honestly admitted to your own shortcomings
and achieved results, even if you had to rely
on others. I applaud your flexible judgment.

206726.「うおーん うおーん。クオード様ぁ～！！ \n そんな言葉を かけてもらえるなん:
Uwaah, uwaah! Master Quard～!! I'm so
honored you would say that～!

206727.「それから……<pc>に 姉さん。\n こんな俺の言葉を 信じてくれて ありがと:
And... <pc>, sis. Thank you for
trusting me.

206728.「<pc>には 礼を 用意している。\n ささやかだが 受け取ってくれ。:
I have a thank you gift for <pc>.
It's not much, but please accept it.

206729.「時見の箱に頼りきっていた 我が父……\n ドミネウスがなしえなかった 滅びの回:
We have averted the destruction that my father Domineus, who relied so heavily on the Timeseer Box, could not, by our own strength
alone!

206730.「ここは 祝いの宴でも もうけたいところだが\n お前には大事な用が あるんだっ:
I'd love to have a party to celebrate, but you
have something important to do, don't you?

206731.「ディアンジ ザグルフ……さがってくれ。\n あとで また 連絡する。:
Dianji, Zagulf... you're dismissed. I'll
contact you later.

206732.「さて……マデ神殿のことだがな。\n 王宮消失にともない 古文書の大半が失われ\:
Now... about Made Temple. With the loss of the
royal manor, most of the archives were lost,
and it took a lot of searching.

206733.「このカギを 覚えているか <pc>。\n いにしえの時代に封じられた マデ神殿:
Do you remember this key, ? It is said that the Liberator Door of Made Temple, which was sealed in ancient times, can
be unlocked with this Timeseer's Key.

206734.「こいつは 王家の秘奥に通ずるための\n 王たる者の証。マデ神殿も また……\n:
It is the symbol of a king who has access to
the secrets of the royal family. Made Temple
is also one of those secrets.

206735.「今回は 俺も同行する。これが 王としての\n 最後の仕事に なるだろうからな…:
This time I'm coming with you. This will be my
final duty as king...

206736.「ティプローネ高地の 北西にある\n マデ神殿の扉を 開きにいくぞ。:
We're going to open the door to the Made
Temple, northwest of the Tiplone Highlands.

206738.「幾度となく あなたを 導いてきたけれど\n いつもいつも 思わせぶりなことしか:
I'm sorry I've misled you so many times, only
leaving you with cryptic words... I'm sorry...

206739.「決定的なことを 伝えてしまうと\n 正しい未来への道筋が 閉ざされてしまうかも:
But if I told you too much, then the path to a
righteous future might be lost to us...

206740.「これで 最後になるというのに……\n やっぱり たいしたことは 言えないわね。:
I can't say more than this... but this will be
the last time.

206741.「ひと目でも カオを見れて よかった。:
It was nice to see you again, even if only for
a moment.

206743.「これから 私は……\n 最後の役目を まっとうするわ。: Now... I must fulfill my final task.

206744.「この島に生きる すべての民を守り\n エテーネの未来を 切りひらいてみせる。:
I will protect all the people of Ethene, and
open the path to their future.

206745.「……命に代えても 成功させてみせるわ。\n それが 王家に生まれた者の つとめ:
I will succeed even if it costs me my life.
That's what a person born into royalty is
supposed to do.

206746.「ふたりとも さようなら。\n 願わくば 私たちの選ぶ道が\n 正しき未来へと:
Goodbye, you two. I hope that the path we have
chosen will lead us into a better future.

206747.「キュロノスを倒して\n 滅びの未来を 回避できたなら……\n ボクたちは きっ:
If we can defeat Kyuronos and avert a future
of destruction, I'm sure we will be reunited!

206748.「<pc>を 信じるキュ！\n ボクたちは 必ず キュロノスを倒すキュ！:
Have faith in <pc>, kyu! We will
defeat Kyuronos, kyu!

206749.「キュロノスを倒したら 迎えにきて。\n ずっとずっと……待っているから。:
When you defeat Kyuronos, come and find me.
I'll be waiting for you for as long as it
takes.

206750.「あいつは……すべてを知ってしまった\n メレアーデだったキュね……。:
That... that was the Mereade who knows
everything, kyu...

206751.「メレアーデにならって ボクたちも\n なすべきことを まっとうするキュ！\n:
We will follow Mereade's lead and do what we
must, kyu! We're going to the Royal City to
activate the Eternal Ring, kyu!

206920.「先ほどの 声のぬしは 貴様だな？: That was you earlier, wasn't it?

206922.「魔物ッ！ いや 魔法生物か！？: A monster! No, a magical creature!?

206923.「やれやれ……。\n 建国の祖の一角たる 偉人を相手に\n 無礼きわまりない奴だ:
Good grief... no manners to one of the great
founders of your nation, kyuree.

206924.「私の名は 漂流者キュレクス。\n エテーネ王国 建国の祖たる\n 初代国王レト:
I am known as Kyurex, the castaway. I was the
best friend of Retrius, the founder and first
ruler of the Ethene Kingdom.

206925.「キュレクス…………だと？\n つくなら もう少し ましなウソをつけ。\n ７０:
Kyurex? If you're going to lie, you might as
well make it more convincing, because that
would make you over 700 years old.

206926.「……そもそも キュレクスは人間のはずよ。: ...And Kyurex is supposed to be human.

206927.「私は まごうことなき キュレクス本人。\n アストルティアとは 異なる世界より:
I am, without a doubt, Kyurex. An otherworldly
lifeform from beyond Astoltia, kyure.

206928.「ゆえに 人間よりも はるかに長寿キュレ。\n かたや レトリウスの子孫は 着々:
Hence, I have a much longer life span than humans. Retrius' descendants, on the other hand, have been steadily passing from
generation to generation, and you, Quard, are the 50th, kyure.

206929.「時見の箱に 心を奪われた 先王とちがい\n お前は 時見に頼ることなく 迫る滅:
Unlike your predecessor, whose heart was stolen by the Timeseer Box, you've managed to avoid imminent destruction without relying on
it, kyure. I'm impressed.

206931.「それにしても おもしろい姉弟だキュレ～。\n 時渡りで 別々の時代へ流され そ:
But still, you're quite the interesting pair.
Transported through time to different eras,
spending time in different places, kyure.

206932.「なるほど。姉と弟で 生体継続時間が\n 逆転してるのも 納得キュレ。:
I see. It is understandable that the
biological gap of the sister and brother has
been reversed, kyure.

206934.「そう言ってるキュレ。いい機会だから\n 祖先に 都合のいい歴史を吹き込まれた\:
That's what I was saying, kyure. I'll take this opportunity to teach you the true history to you who were given a more... convenient
version.

206935.「そもそも お前たちが宿す 時渡りのチカラは\n 私が 朋友レトリウスに 分けあ:
First, the power of time travel that you possess was inherited from my friend Retrius, whom I bestowed it upon. This power has
been passed down through many generations, still to this very day, kyure.

206936.「しかし 私は……人間を 見誤ったキュレ。\n レトリウスが いかに 高潔な人物:
But I... had misjudged humans, kyure. However
noble Retrius may have been, the same could
not be said of their descendants...

206937.「人間とは 世代をかさねる 生き物だと\n 当時の私は 理解していなかったキュレ:
At the time, I was unaware that humans were a
species that reproduced across generations,
kyure.

206938.「エテーネを築いた レトリウスは とっとと\n 死んでいったキュレ……。残された:
Retrius, who built Ethene, died quickly. The children and grandchildren that remained wanted me to watch over the kingdom,
entrusting it to me, kyure.

206939.「そうして エテーネ王国は 私の時見を活用し\n 自然災害や 飢饉による危機を回:
And so the Ethene Kingdom, taking advantage of my insight, averted crises caused by natural disasters and famine. Soon it became very
prosperous, kyure.

206940.「しかし 最初こそ 神のごとく敬っていた私を\n 祭司たち……レトリウスの子孫は:
However...as a being who was once revered as a god, the priests saw to it to manipulate me... Those descendants of Retrius exploited
my powers to foresee time on a whim, kyure.

206941.「当時の祭司長は 錬金術で作った道具をもちいて\n 私から 時見の源泉を奪った挙:
The chief priest of the time, using alchemical
tools, deprived me of the Timeseer Source. I
was then sealed inside Made Temple, kyure.

206942.「その後 彼らは 私のチカラの源から\n 物言わぬ 時見の能力だけを持った存在を:
After that, they created from the source of my
power a being that could only see and hear,
and sealed it in the Timeseer Box, kyure.

206944.「ご名答。そして 時見の箱と交信できるのは\n 時渡りのチカラを 受け継ぐ\n:
That is correct. The ability to communicate
with the Timeseer Box lies within the blood
of Retrius' descendants...

206945.「私たちの祖先が そんな ひどいことを\n おこなっていたなんて……。:
I can't believe our ancestors did such a
terrible thing...

206946.「返せるものなら その 時見の源泉を\n お返ししたいのですが……王宮が消えた\:
I would give back the Timeseer Source if I
could, but now that the royal manor is gone,
it may be lost...

206947.「いいや まだ 存在しているキュレ。\n この島の どこかから かつて私の一部だ:
No, it still exists, kyure. From somewhere on
this island, I feel the vibrations of the
Timeseer Source that was once a part of me.

206948.「奪われた 時見の源泉は お前たちの\n 言葉でいうと 球根みたいな形をしてるキ:
The stolen Timeseer Source is shaped like a
"bulb", in your language. Have you seen
anything like that, kyure?

206950.「前に <pc>と 王家の温室に行ったとき\n 目にした 巨大な球根！\n あれ:
I saw a giant bulb the last time I was in the
Royal Greenhouse with <pc>! Could
that be the same thing?

206951.「もし 時見の源泉を 返してくれたなら\n お前たちが 行きたがっている\n 時:
If you return the Timeseer Source to me, I
will allow you to go to the Time Labyrinth
in which you so desire, kyure.

206952.「きっと まちがいないわ！\n 軍区画の転送の門から\n 王家の温室に 行ってみ:
I'm sure I'm not wrong! Let's go to the Royal
Greenhouse through the Relay Gate in the Army
Ward.

206953.「おお……なつかしい この波動。\n まごうことなき 時見の源泉キュレね。:
Oh... how I remember this feeling. It truly is
the Timeseer Source, kyure.

206954.「奪われていたものを 返されて\n 礼を言うのも おかしな話キュレ。:
It is passing strange to thank the ones who
took it from me in the first place, kyure.

206955.「けれど 時見の源泉を奪ったのは\n 遠い祖先のしわざで お前たちではないキュレ:
But it was the deeds of your ancestors that
took the Timeseer Source away from me, not
you, kyure. I thank you wholeheartedly.

206956.「では さっそく いただくキュレ。: Now then, I'll be taking this, kyure.

206958.「ブフィ～。ひさかたぶりに 真の姿を\n 取り戻したキュレ！\n かつてない 高:
Ahh～! For the first time in ages, my true
form is restored, kyure! I feel incredible,
kyure～!

206959.「キュ～レ♪ キュレキュレ♪ キュ～レキュレ♪\n ７００年ぶりの時見を ためし:
Kyure ♪ Kyure, kyure ♪ Kyure, kyure ♪
Let me try looking through time for the first
time in 700 years, kyure.

206960.「キュレェ～ッ！ 見える！ 時が見える！！: Kyure～! I see it! I can see time!

206961.「エテーネ王国は……間もなく……滅びる……。: The Ethene Kingdom... will soon... perish...

206963.「どういうことですか？\n 水没による滅亡なら 回避したはずです！:
What do you mean? If you're talking about the
submersion, then we have already avoided it!

206964.「お前たちは ７００年の 長きにわたり\n 時見を くり返してきた……。:
You have been looking back and forth through
time for 700 years...

206965.「大津波 大飢饉 水没……\n さまざまな災厄を 避けてきたが\n それは 運命:
Tsunamis, famine, submergence... you have
avoided all sorts of calamities, but that
only distorts destiny.

206966.「運命を変える……その度に 歪みは増大し\n 回避した幾多の災厄は 束ねられ\n:
Each time destiny is altered, the distortions
grow, and the many disasters averted will
coalesce into an even greater calamity.

206969.「見てのとおり 隕石の落下で 滅ぶ未来キュレ。\n 王都を守る 守護障壁があろう:
As you saw, the future will be one of destruction by a falling meteorite. Even with the protective barrier around the Royal City,
it cannot be stopped, kyure.

206970.「ふざけるなッ！ 俺たちのやったことが\n 無意味だったとでも 言うのかッ！？:
Don't screw with me! Are you saying that
everything we've done until now was for
nothing!?

206971.「この ペテン師めッ！\n どうせ 妖しげな術で 幻覚を見せただけだ！\n お前:
You charlatan! That was just an illusion you
conjured with your magic! Who would ever
believe something so ridiculous!?

206973.「……やれやれ。せっかちな奴だキュレ。\n でも お前たちは 動じていないキュレ:
Good grief, such an impatient fellow, kyure.
But you two are completely unfazed, kyure.

206974.「あなたが 真の時見の使い手なら\n 隕石による滅びをも 回避する未来を\n 見:
If you truly are a master of time seeing, you
can show us a future in which the destruction
from the meteorite is averted... can't you?

206975.「たとえ 回避したそばから 次の滅びが\n おそってきたとしても……私たちは 黙:
We cannot just sit back and accept the next
destruction, not when we just averted the
previous one!

206976.「ブッフォオオオオーッ！！\n キモのすわった 奴だキュレ。お前からは\n 確か:
Buufoooh! You're a bold one, kyure. I can
certainly see Retrius' blood flowing through
you, kyure.

206977.「そんな お前には 隕石落下を阻止する\n とっておきの秘策を さずけてやるキュ:
I'll give you a secret plan to stop the
meteorite from falling on your heads, kyure.

206978.「ぜひ お願いします！: Yes, by all means, please do!

206979.「王都キィンベルの 中央広場には\n 永久時環と名付けられた 砂時計のような\n:
Do you know of the Eternal Ring, the
hourglass-like structure in the central plaza
of Kimbel, kyure?

206980.「永久時環は ただの芸術作品ではないキュレ。\n 空中に散らばる 微量な時渡りの:
The Eternal Ring is not just some sculpture.
It is a device that absorbs and stores time
travel power scattered in the air, kyure.

206981.「かつて レトリウスと 腹心のユマテルという\n 錬金術師が 子孫が起こすであろ:
Retrius and their trusted friend, an alchemist named Umatel, built it in anticipation of the mistakes that would be made by their
descendants, kyure.

206982.「……あいつらは たいした知恵者だったキュレ。\n 永久時環を用いれば 隕石とい:
...They were very clever, I must say. With the
Eternal Ring, even the calamity of an incoming
meteorite would be nothing, kyure.

206983.「ただし 永久時環を 起動させるには\n レトリウスの血をひく者……:
However, only someone who carries Retrius'
blood can activate the Eternal Ring...

206984.「ここを出て 右手の通路を進めば\n マデ氏族の叡智が眠る 祭具棟と呼ばれる場所:
If you leave here and follow the passage on your right, you will reach a place called the ritual building, where the wisdom of the Made
clan rests.

206985.「まず 祭具棟へ行って 花のリストレットを探し\n それを身につけて 戻ってくる:
First, find the flower wristlet inside the
ritual building, put it on, and come back
here. We'll continue our discussion then.

206986.「おお！ 戻ってきたキュレね。\n 花のリストレットは 見つけたキュレ？:
Oh! You're back, kyure. Did you find the
flower wristlet?

206987.「さっそく 永久時環の起動法を\n 伝授するキュレ。もっと そばに来るキュレ。:
I will now instruct you on how to activate the
Eternal Ring. Come closer, kyure.

206988.「脳に直接 大量の情報を送るから\n ちょ～っと 具合が 悪くなるかもしれないけ:
I'll be sending a lot of information directly
to your brain, so you might feel a bit ill,
but you'll just have to tough it out, kyure!

206990.「……私が チカラを取り戻したのを\n キュロノスに 感知されたようキュレ。:
Kyuronos must have sensed that I regained my
strength, kyure.

206991.「私は 正しき時の流れの 守護者。:
I am the guardian of the righteous flow of
time.

206992.「来たるべき未来を さまたげんとする者よ。\n キュロノスの裁きを 受けよ！:
Let those who would impede the coming of the
proper future be judged by Kyuronos!

206993.<center>貴様が キュレクス……。\n我が祖にして 同等の能力をもつ個体。:
You are Kyurex... my progenitor, and one of
equal ability to mine.

206994.<center>なんと ちっぽけな。\n失望を 禁じ得ない……。:
How small and insignificant. I can't help but
be disappointed...

206995.<center>なれど 貴様の存在を許したとあれば\n雑音なき世界を到来させる:
But if I allow you to exist, you will be a
hindrance to the coming of a world free of
noise.

206996.「あわれな……。時見を通じ 幾度となく\n 人間たちの闇を 直視し続けた果てに\:
How pitiful... having been exposed to the
darker nature of man time and time again, you
yourself have become distorted, kyure.

206997.「さわがしいキュ！ 安眠妨害っキュよ！:
It's too noisy, kyu! You're interrupting my
nap, kyu!

206998.「キュキュキュキュ！？\n 何が どうなってるキュ！？: Kyukyukyukyu!? What's going on here, kyu!?

207001.<center>邪魔者は 排除した。\n残るは……時の異分子に協力する\n同祖の:
An obstacle has been removed. All that remains
now is the other one that aids the interloper
of time...

207002.<center>なれど 時見すらできぬ 未熟な個体など\n手を下すに 値せず。:
But one who cannot even see through time is
not even worth my effort.

207003.<center>我こそは 唯一無二の 時の支配者。\nならぶ者なき 究極の存在。:
I am the one and only ruler of time. The
ultimate existence without equal.

207005.「もう 間にあわないキュレ……\n それより 小さき者よ……私のそばに……。:
It's too late for me, kyure... more
importantly... little one, come closer...

207006.「ボクのことは キュルルと呼ぶキュ。\n ……お前を見てると モヤモヤするんだけ:
My name's Kyururu, kyu... When I look at you,
I get this strange sensation... just who are
you anyway, kyu?

207007.「その様子だと……私のことはおろか\n 自分が何者かも 理解していないキュレね。:
From your reaction... you don't even know who
you really are, let alone who I am, kyure.
Quickly, now... take my hand...

207008.「なるほど……お前もまた\n 私のチカラの源から 分化した存在……。:
I see... you were also born from the source of
my power...

207009.「それって 親子みたいなものキュ？: You mean like parent and child, kyu?

207010.「親子という概念には 当てはまらないキュレ。\n 私たちは 同一にして 異質なる:
The concept of parent and child does not apply to us, kyure. We are the same, yet different beings... a lifeform from another world,
wandering across the spacetime rift...

207011.「もう 時間がないキュレ……。\n キュルル……お前に 私の……\n 知識と能力:
We are running out of time, kyure...
Kyururu... I will give you all of my knowledge
and abilities.

207013.「……おかしいキュ。\n む…胸が……胸が 苦しいキュ！\n シクシクと 痛みが:
...It's strange, kyu. My chest... my chest
hurts, kyu! The pain won't go away, kyu.

207014.「……彼の死を 悲しいと感じてるからよ。\n あなたにとって キュレクスさんが\:
...It's because you feel sad about his death.
It shows how important Kyurex was to you.

207015.「たった今 出会ったばかりの相手に\n 調子を狂わされるなんて 理解不能キュ。\:
I can't understand how someone I only just met
could make me feel that way, kyu. I'm sure
I'll get over it in no time, kyu.

207016.「アイツから 受け取った知識に 永久時環の\n 起動のしかたがあったキュ！ 隕石:
The knowledge I received from him was how to activate the Eternal Ring, kyu! If you want to avoid a future full of falling meteorites,
you'd better hurry, kyu.

207017.「……わかったわ。王都の広場にある\n 永久時環を 動かしにいきましょう。:
Okay. Let's go activate the Eternal Ring in
the plaza of the Royal City.

220256.「メレアーデよ お前が 資格者の証を\n 身につける必要があるキュレ。お前からは:
Mereade, you have the qualifications needed. I
sense the blood of Retrius is strongest within
you, kyure.

229909.「水没する未来を 回避したことによって\n より 大きな災厄が おそってくるキュ:
The avoidance of the future of submersion has
given way to an even greater calamity, kyure.
